Question
========
What is one benefit of using synthetic data with AI tools?

Answerlist
----------
* It avoids confidentiality risks while still enabling code generation and testing
* It guarantees the AI will infer the true structure of your real data
* It removes the need for any data cleaning
* It produces identical results to your real data without changes

Solution
========
Synthetic data lets you work safely while still getting useful code or analysis ideas.

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False
* False
* False
